oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.oaext.osn.publicutil.converter.bool
Class OsnBooleanConverter

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.oaext.osn.publicutil.converter.OsnFieldValueConverter
      oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.oaext.osn.publicutil.converter.bool.OsnBaseBooleanValueConverter
          oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.oaext.osn.publicutil.converter.bool.OsnBooleanConverter

public class OsnBooleanConverter
extends OsnBaseBooleanValueConverter

A configurable converter which will convert the Object passed in into a boolean type based upon a customizable list of accepted (white-list/true) or rejected (black-list/false) values.

If the object passed into convertBoolean is of type java.lang.Boolean then this will be immediately returned. Otherwise toString will be called on the object and the resultant String will be compared using a case-insensitive comparison to the trueValue or falseValues Comma Separated Values (CSV) using the following algorithm:

  • trueValues and falseValues provided then use trueValues and ignore falseValues.
  • trueValues=null and falseValues=null, default trueValues to be "y,t,1,yes,true".
  • trueValues supplied then split the trueValues CSV and see if the passed in value matches one of the values. If so return true otherwise false.
  • falseValues supplied and trueValues=null then split the falseValues CSV and see if passed in value matches one of those values. If so return false otherwise true.

The CSV parameters will conform to a standard CSV encoding to ensure the parameters do not become corrupt during persistence. Double quotes will be escaped by a second double quote (e.g. " -> "") and each entry in the CSV can be quoted.

Since:
11.1.1.7.3

Method Detail

convertBoolean

protected boolean convertBoolean(java.lang.Object initialValue,
                                 OsnConversionContext context)
                          throws OsnConversionException
The implementation of the boolean conversion routine. If an issue occurs during the conversion meaning that the boolean conversion cannot succeed then a OsnConversionException should be thrown.

See class javadoc for algorithm for whitelist/blacklist conversion.

Specified by:
convertBoolean in class OsnBaseBooleanValueConverter
Parameters:
initialValue - the value to convert.
context - additional data that is useful during the conversion.
Returns:
the converted value.
Throws:
OsnConversionException - thrown if initialValue == null.
